data.description: Tied interface for the Data::Page module
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This simple module is mainly just a tied interface for the
    Data::Page module by Leon Brocard. Hence the namespace
    Data::Page::Tied.

    I had the code flying around anyway and considering the number of
    people asking about how they can paginate their data in arrays in
    their CGI scripts, I prefer pointing to this module instead of
    helping each and everyone individually. Lazy, I am. :)

    The Module List Chapter may not be appropriate, maybe
    "Miscellaneous" would be better.
